synopsis.text: Crown Prince Jordy's peaceful life in the medieval-inspired world of Arst is shattered when his homeland falls to the ruthless conqueror, Marder. Escaping Marder's clutches, Jordy is hidden away by a devoted retainer, only to stumble upon the mythical giant robot, Galient, hidden deep within a valley. As Jordy discovers his innate ability to command Galient, he becomes the beacon of hope for his people. In a world where advanced robot panzers threaten to dominate the Crescent Galaxy, Jordy must unlock the secrets of Galient's power and confront Marder to reclaim his kingdom and protect his loved ones. Little does he know, the key to his connection with Galient may lie with the enigmatic Hirumuka and the mysterious lights that appeared during the robot's awakening. Can Jordy unravel the truth and save Arst before it's too late?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
